articles.title: Peru Halts Trial for Chinese Covid-19 Vaccine - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Health Ministry says trial for Sinopharm vaccine was temporarily suspended after a volunteer presented neurological problems
articles.content:
LIMA, PeruPerus Health Ministry said Saturday it has suspended a trial for a Chinese Covid-19 vaccine after a participant presented health problems.
